topic.title: How can I add a custom Outline view for editing XML documents in the Text mode?

body.p: Let's say you have XML documents like <doc startnumber="15"> <sec counter="no"> <info/> <title>Introduction</title> </sec> <sec> <title>Section title</title> <para>Content</para> <sec> <title>Section title</title> <para>Content</para> </sec> </sec> <sec> <title>Section title</title> <para>Content</para> </sec> </doc>and you want to display the XML content in a simplified Outline view like:doc "15" sec Introduction sec 15 Section title sec 15.1 Section title sec 16 Section title

Usually an Outline should have the following characteristics:
Double clicking in the Outline the corresponding XML content would get selected.
When the caret moves in the opened XML document the Outline would select the proper entry.
When modifications occur in the document, the Outline would refresh.
